nox:section.p: The following are some web projects I developed with the NOX framework between 2003 and 2007.

p.strong: The official web site of Aikido Alicante

td.p: The design is based on a digitally edited painting of a wave. The news on the frontpage are obtained via AJAX calls to a Wordpress blog. There is also a quite comprehensive photo album in the Activities section. Calendar data is inserted via Xincludes.
In 2011, I migrated the site to Joomla to allow online collaboration and integration with Google Calendar.

This site provides a multilingual structure that allows page based translation. It also integrates content feeds from Wordpress via a PHP proxy and XSLT reformatting (this allows them to be indexed by the search engine).
The current site is a new development maintained by a different provider.
